snippet: The pop star bypassed the standard practice of relentless promotion when she released her album last week, and the impressive response may have blazed a new trail for the music industry.
abstract: Music star Beyonce bypasses standard practice of relentless promotion when she releases her new album on iTunes, instead notifies her fans on Instagram; album, selling 365,000 copies in United States on first day, will likely have one of year's biggest opening sales weeks; impressive response may blaze a new trail for the music industry, demonstrating social media's power.
lead_paragraph: The pop star bypassed the standard practice of relentless promotion when she released her album last week, and the impressive response may have blazed a new trail for the music industry.

headline.main: Beyoncé Rejects Tradition for Social Media’s Power
headline.print_headline: Beyoncé Rejects Tradition For Social Media’s Power
